summary: That figure refers to funds for contracts with insufficent paperwork.

statements.quote: The problem is, you talk, but you don't get anything done, Hillary. You don't. Just like when you ran the State Department, $6 billion was missing. How do you miss $6 billion? You ran the State Department, $6 billion was either stolen â€” they don't know. It's gone, $6 billion. If you become president, this country is going to be in some mess. Believe me.

name: $6 billion went missing, possibly stolen, from State Department
